definition: to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]

sentences.english: Some of the farmers had quit farming and were cutting railroad ties so they could feed their families.
sentences.chinese: 有些农民放弃了耕作，靠砍伐铺铁路的枕木养家糊口。

sentences.english: We are cutting down the rainforest.
The strategy of avoided deforestation, however, offers much more.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免砍伐森林而制定的对策则有效。

sentences.english: Already 4 million trees have been felled or marked for destruction.
sentences.chinese: 已经有4百万棵树被砍伐或是标记要毁掉的。

sentences.english: On the one hand , we shouldn't cut down trees without permission.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，自己们不该私行砍伐树木。

sentences.english: Native trees which are lost due to construction shall be replanted.
sentences.chinese: 须重新种植在建造工程期间砍伐土生品种树木。

sentences.english: They ordered that for every tree cut down two more should be planted.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求每砍伐一棵树就要补栽两棵树。

sentences.english: We must stop cutting down forests.
sentences.chinese: 我们应当停止砍伐森林。

sentences.english: Deforestation follows a Kuznets curve, too.
sentences.chinese: 森林的砍伐也形成了Kuznets曲线。

sentences.english: We will fell these great trees.
This is the smallest deforestation in the history of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 这是亚马逊雨林史上最低的砍伐量。

sentences.english: And in that moment, villagers started arriving, and wracking down bushes and saplings.
sentences.chinese: 而那时，村民们赶来了，开始砍伐灌木矮树。

sentences.english: They ordered that for every tree cut down two more be planted.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求每砍伐一棵就要补栽两棵树。

sentences.english: In the meanwhile, we are supposed to stop deforesting in large amount.
sentences.chinese: 同时，我们应该制止大量砍伐森林。

sentences.english: It was Nanmu wood cut down at that time that was used to make the pillars in this hall.
sentences.chinese: 当年那些被砍伐的楠木就是被用来制作这些柱子的。

sentences.english: Ashenvale Forest begins to be cut and cleared by the Warsong Clan.
sentences.chinese: 战歌氏族开始砍伐灰谷森林。

definition: to chop wood/to chop down trees
moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc
